mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_faq(faq_no,category_no,faq_title, faq_content) VALUES(seq_faq.nextval, (SELECT category_no FROM tbl_category WHERE category_name=#{category_name}), #{faq_title}, #{faq_content})
mapper.select: SELECT faq.faq_no,cate.category_no,cate.category_name,faq.faq_title,faq.faq_content,faq.faq_hit FROM tbl_faq faq, tbl_category cate WHERE faq.category_no=cate.category_no

SELECT faq.faq_no,cate.category_no,cate.category_name,faq.faq_title,faq.faq_content,faq.faq_hit FROM tbl_faq faq, tbl_category cate WHERE faq.category_no=cate.category_no AND faq.category_no=#{category_no}
